snippet: Richard Sherman, now one of football's most prolific pitchmen, said he doesn't have some master plan to craft a particular image in his endorsement choices....
lead_paragraph: Richard Sherman, now one of football's most prolific pitchmen, said he doesn't have some master plan to craft a particular image in his endorsement choices.

headline.main: Sherman and Gronkowski Star in Digital Short Series
headline.print_headline: Sherman and Gronkowski Star in Digital Short Series
